item.title: Custom Linux Distro: From Yocto Build to 60% Boot Time Optimization
item.description: A key user experience metric for NAS products: how long from pressing power to accessing shared folders? Our target was 30 seconds, but the original took 75 seconds. This post documents the complete journey from 75s to 30s.
